thread.title: Jack Wilshere goes off injured against Manchester City and everyone finds it ENTIRELY predictable
thread.title_full: Jack Wilshere goes off injured against Manchester City and everyone finds it ENTIRELY predictable

author: James Whaling
title: Jack Wilshere goes off injured against Manchester City and everyone finds it ENTIRELY predictable
text:
Sport Jack Wilshere goes off injured against Manchester City and everyone finds it ENTIRELY predictable The Bournemouth midfielder had been enjoying a better time of things on the injury front, until City's trip to the Vitality Stadium Share Wilshere heads for the changing room (Photo: REUTERS) Share Get Arsenal FC     
There are three certainties in life. 
Death, taxes... and Jack Wilshere picking up an injury at some point over the course of a football season. 
To be fair to the Bournemouth midfielder, on a season-long loan from Arsenal, he has managed to stay injury free since his temporary switch to the Vitality Stadium in the summer. 
But that run came to a very sad and very predictable end as he was forced off after taking a bang to his ankle in a challenge with David Silva just before half-time of the Cherries' clash with Manchester City. 
And it's fair to say the world of Twitter was not very surprised. And not very sympathetic. Bournemouth's Jack Wilshere receives medical attention (Photo: REUTERS) Jack Wilshere of Bournemouth battles for the ball with Kevin De Bruyne of Manchester City (Photo: Michael Steele / Getty)
